Raleigh.Meredith Township, Wake County, North Ca:
Meredith Township (also designated Township 11) is one of twenty townships within Wake County, North Carolina. As of the 2010 census, Meredith Township had a population of 13,926, a 21.2% increase over 2000.
Meredith Township, occupying 9.6 square miles (24.8 km2) in central Wake County, is almost completely occupied by portions of the city of Raleigh.
